products.name: traditional-croissant
products.title: Traditional Croissant
products.description: Flaky, buttery pastry with a tender, airy crumb. Made from our signature levain sourdough and crafted over a 48-hour fermentation
products.fullDescription: Flaky, buttery pastry with a tender, airy crumb. Made from our signature levain sourdough and crafted over a 48-hour fermentation, this croissant delivers a perfect balance of rich flavor and delicate texture. Delicious on its own or paired with your favorite spread.

products.name: -cheese-bread
products.title: ​Cheese Bread
products.description: Soft and savory loaf enriched with melted cheese inside and out. Made with our signature dough and aged cheddar, this bread offers a rich, buttery flavor and a golden, crispy crust.
products.fullDescription: Soft and savory loaf enriched with melted cheese inside and out. Made with our signature dough and aged cheddar, this bread offers a rich, buttery flavor and a golden, crispy crust.
